statements: SELECT * FROM car_models ORDER BY model_name ASC
SELECT model_name, manufacturer_id FROM car_models WHERE manufacturer_id = 1
SELECT id, model_name FROM car_models WHERE model_name LIKE 'SUV%'
SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE manufacturer_id = 5 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT model_name, maintenance_schedule FROM car_models WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE manufacturer_id = 1 ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT id, model_name, manufacturer_id FROM car_models WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer_id, LENGTH(maintenance_schedule) AS schedule_length FROM car_models WHERE manufacturer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%oil%' AND maintenance_schedule LIKE '%filter%';
SELECT manufacturer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_models FROM car_models GROUP BY manufacturer_id HAVING total_models > 3 ORDER BY total_models DESC;
SELECT * FROM car_models;
SELECT model_name, production_year FROM car_models ORDER BY production_year ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM manufacturers WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT model_name, production_year FROM car_models WHERE production_year >= 2010;
SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE manufacturer_id = '456e89b7-12d3-89a4-926614174000';
SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE production_year > 2010 ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, production_year FROM car_models WHERE manufacturer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT manufacturer_name, model_name FROM manufacturers JOIN car_models ON manufacturers.id = car_models.manufacturer_id ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC, model_name ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(model_name) AS total_models FROM manufacturers LEFT JOIN car_models ON manufacturers.id = car_models.manufacturer_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name;
SELECT AVG(production_year) AS avg_production_year FROM car_models;
SELECT * FROM car_models;
SELECT model_name, year, manufacturer_id FROM car_models WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_id = 3;
SELECT model_name, maintenance_task FROM car_models JOIN maintenance_schedules ON car_models.model_id = maintenance_schedules.model_id;

SELECT model_name, manufacturer_name, maintenance_task FROM car_models JOIN maintenance_schedules ON car_models.model_id = maintenance_schedules.model_id JOIN manufacturers ON car_models.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id;
SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY model_name ASC
SELECT manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name FROM manufacturers ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC
SELECT model_name, year FROM car_models WHERE manufacturer_id = 1
SELECT model_id, model_name, manufacturer_id FROM car_models WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE frequency LIKE '%months'
SELECT * FROM car_models;
SELECT model_name, year FROM car_models ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer_id FROM car_models WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(model_id) AS total_models FROM manufacturers JOIN car_models ON manufacturers.manufacturer_id = car_models.manufacturer_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name;
SELECT model_name, maintenance_type, recommended_interval FROM car_models JOIN maintenance_schedules ON car_models.model_id = maintenance_schedules.model_id;
SELECT model_name, year FROM car_models WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer_name, model_name, year FROM manufacturers JOIN car_models ON manufacturers.manufacturer_id = car_models.manufacturer_id;
SELECT model_name, maintenance_type, recommended_interval FROM car_models JOIN maintenance_schedules ON car_models.model_id = maintenance_schedules.model_id;

SELECT model_name, manufacturer_name, maintenance_type FROM car_models JOIN manufacturers ON car_models.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id JOIN models_maintenance ON car_models.model_id = models_maintenance.model_id JOIN maintenance_schedules ON models_maintenance.schedule_id = maintenance_schedules.schedule_id;

SELECT model_name, manufacturer_name, maintenance_type, recommended_interval FROM car_models JOIN manufacturers ON car_models.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id JOIN models_maintenance ON car_models.model_id = models_maintenance.model_id JOIN maintenance_schedules ON models_maintenance.schedule_id = maintenance_schedules.schedule_id WHERE manufacturer_name = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM CarModels;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer_id FROM CarModels ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, year_founded FROM Manufacturers WHERE year_founded > 2000;
SELECT car_id, year_made, license_plate FROM Cars WHERE year_made = 2010;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer_name FROM CarModels JOIN Manufacturers ON CarModels.manufacturer_id = Manufacturers.manufacturer_id;
SELECT * FROM CarModels WHERE manufacturer_id = 2 ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, year_founded FROM Manufacturers WHERE year_founded > 2000;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer_name FROM CarModels INNER JOIN Manufacturers ON CarModels.manufacturer_id = Manufacturers.manufacturer_id WHERE CarModels.model_id < 5;
SELECT car_id, license_plate FROM Cars WHERE year_made BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 ORDER BY car_id DESC;
SELECT description FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
